title: And The End?
author: verias
text:
So! This brings this little short story to a close. I hope you guys have enjoyed this little non-adventure adventure. Things are still wildly crazy and nutty in the world of MotA, and it's entirely possible, I might do another short story or so.

If you guys had a choice, what kind of stories would you like to see during this time?

replies.author: Midnight45*Guest*
replies.text:
oops I think I posted my comment on the wrong strip. First let me say love the comic. Second the last page should be The Gift09 as there is already a 8.Last edited by Guest
Edited 1 time(s).
